qas.question: What is the largest Nigerian city?
What type of groups have been failing to keep up with waste management in Nigeria?
What Nigerian community has the worst unsustainable waste management?
What territory is Kubwa Community in?

context: Waste management including sewage treatment, the linked processes of deforestation and soil degradation, and climate change or global warming are the major environmental problems in Nigeria. Waste management presents problems in a mega city like <a0_0>Lagos<a0_0/> and other major Nigerian cities which are linked with economic development, population growth and the inability of <a1_0>municipal councils<a1_0/> to manage the resulting rise in industrial and domestic waste. This huge waste management problem is also attributable to unsustainable environmental management lifestyles of <a2_0>Kubwa Community<a2_0/> in the <a3_0>Federal Capital Territory<a3_0/>, where there are habits of indiscriminate disposal of waste, dumping of waste along or into the canals, sewerage systems that are channels for water flows, etc.
